coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, Inflige 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, Inflige 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 1 de Contador de Temple, 1 Charge Count, 1 Haste, 1 Nivel Ofensivo Aumentado, or 1 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

[OnSucceedAttack] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, Inflige 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (7 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 2 de Contador de Temple, 2 Charge Count, 2 Haste, 2 Nivel Ofensivo Aumentado, or 2 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

levelList.name: Fell Bullet
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [BoseProjektil] (max 7)
- If it was an A-Reson., gain (highest Reson. +2) [BoseProjektil] instead
[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 [Breath] for every [BoseProjektil] (max 3)
[EndSkill] Lose every [BoseProjektil]

coindescs.desc: +5% Damage on Critical Hit for every [BoseProjektil] (max 35%)
[CriticalTargetKill] If this unit has the [Bullet] effect, gain 1 [Bullet] (2 times per Encounter)
